# Fairground

Provides support for [Fairground](https://thefairground.com/) widgets.

### Required parameters

-   `data-ad-type`
-   `data-id`

## Example

```html
  <amp-embed width="640"
             height="100"
             layout="fixed"
             style="border: none"
             type="fairground"
             data-ad-type="campaign"
             data-id="fa68d786-0b4f-437d-9b6b-fc1f54209cfd"
></amp-embed>

<amp-embed width="640"
           height="800"
           layout="fixed"
           style="border: none"
           type="fairground"
           data-ad-type="embed"
           data-id="21f04688-ca8b-4b73-86a7-f0663e86d3a3"
></amp-embed>
```
